pullrequest.title: dependencies_archive.sh: add gz11 dependencies for ign-physics

content.raw:
A note on the Ubuntu build’s unstable status: All of the codecheck issues are either

1. a syntax parsing error for codecheck \[i.e. codecheck itself is failing to parse the C\+\+ syntax, which has nothing wrong with it\], or
2. an information notice which doesn’t actually indicate an issue \[i.e. codecheck used to emit false flags, so we added warning suppressions, but now that codecheck bug is fixed\]

Basically, everything codecheck is emitting is either a former or current bug in codecheck itself, so I would recommend we don’t block on it.
content.html:
A note on the Ubuntu build’s unstable status: All of the codecheck issues are either

  1. a syntax parsing error for codecheck [i.e. codecheck itself is failing to parse the C++ syntax, which has nothing wrong with it], or
  2. an information notice which doesn’t actually indicate an issue [i.e. codecheck used to emit false flags, so we added warning suppressions, but now that codecheck bug is fixed]

Basically, everything codecheck is emitting is either a former or current bug in codecheck itself, so I would recommend we don’t block on it.
